name: SmartLess
tagline: Three friends surprise each other with mystery celebrity guests
description: SmartLess is a podcast featuring Jason Bateman, Sean Hayes, and Will Arnett. Each episode features one of the hosts surprising the others with a mystery guest, leading to unscripted and hilarious conversations.
host: Jason Bateman, Sean Hayes, Will Arnett
cons: Sometimes feels like an inside joke
